name: SF JobsNOW!
description: Subsidized employment program helping unemployed residents find jobs
fullDescription: SF JobsNOW! is San Francisco's subsidized employment program, providing wage subsidies to employers who hire unemployed San Francisco residents, making it easier for job seekers to find work.
whatTheyOffer:
- Wage subsidies for employers who hire you
- Job placement assistance
- Training opportunities
- Career coaching and support
- Connections to Bay Area employers
- Follow-up support after placement
howToGetIt:
1. Visit OEWD website or local One-Stop Career Center
2. Complete intake and assessment
3. Meet with employment specialist
4. Receive job placement assistance
5. Employer receives wage subsidy when you're hired
